body:
If you are having trouble watching the video in your book, then the Flash installed on your browser is not streaming the video properly. Adobe Flash Player is a technology your browser uses to play the video on our site.

You may be able to fix this problem by disabling any extensions installed on your browser that you do not use. Extensions can interfere with how your browser handles Flash content. You can view all of your extensions here:

chrome://extensions

Click the icon of a trash can to remove any extensions you do not recognize or use.

Alternatively, you can download and use a completely new browser. A newly installed browser will not have any extensions installed, and you will be able to log in to your account using it to open your book and view your videos.

Mozilla Firefox is a fast, secure browser that you can download for free here:

http://www.firefox.com

Click on the button to download Firefox and follow the prompts to install it to your computer. Once you have Firefox installed, please use it to download and install Flash again here:

http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer

Once you have an updated version of Flash on the Firefox browser, you should have no further problems with the video in your book.
closing: If you have any questions, please let me know.
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.

If nothing happens when you click the play button, Adobe Flash Player is being blocked by your browser, Google Chrome.

To fix this, open your exercise and click on the padlock icon at the top-left corner of your browser's address bar. Find the drop-down list for Flash and choose "Always allow on this site."

You will also need to click the puzzle piece icon to the right of the address bar, then click "Run Flash this time."

Once you have adjusted these settings, click the play button again.

body:
If you bought a book from somewhere other than your campus bookstore, it may not have included a book key. The book key is usually packaged with your textbook in a white envelope or printed on the inside of a separate cardboard bi-fold that may be shrink-wrapped in plastic. The HLC book key is a 19 character code that may contain dashes. The fourth character should be "S."

If you purchased a used book or a stand-alone book that did not include the Heinle Learning Center package, you can purchase your online book access (the same as entering a book key) by going to http://hlc.quia.com and logging in. Enter your course code and, when your course information appears, click the "buy" link for your book. This will take you to the Cengage website, where you can purchase the needed access for your book. Please be sure that the receipt (including the part with the phone number of the bookstore) is legible in your e-mail message. If you have a book key, enter it now and click Go. Your book key is a series of 16-19 letters and numbers and the 4th digit should be "S". Verify your name and follow the prompts to save your book key to your account. You can then safely discard your book key.

body:
To purchase a book key, log in to your account and enter the course code your instructor gave you. When you see your course information, click on the "buy" link for the book you need. This will take you to the Cengage website, where you can purchase the needed access for your book. I recommend purchasing the "Cengage Unlimited" package, as this is the most reasonably priced option.

If you do buy that package, follow these steps to obtain your book key:

1) After purchasing Unlimited, search on the product title or ISBN
2) In the results, add the iLrn product to Home (there can be several products, eBooks ,etc associated with a title--pick the iLrn one)
3) Close the green box
4) A blue "Open" button will appear--click on it!
5) You will go to the register/access page with instructions on how to register on the iLrn site. You will need to copy the book key generated on this page
6) Click on "Register"
7) You will go to the cengage.com/ilrn page--this is the page to bookmark as we will post updates on the ilrn conversion and other resources here.
8) Click on "Sign in"
9) You will go to hlc.quia.com where you either log into your existing student account or create a new one
10) Paste the book key you copied into the "Book Key" field in the upper right of the student workstation
11) Your iLrn course will appear (if you have multiple iLrn courses you might have to scroll)
12) Enter the course code you got from your instructor. You're done!
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to assist you.

body:
If nothing happens when you click the play button, Adobe Flash Player is being blocked by your browser, Safari.

You can follow these steps to enable Flash Player:

1. Open Safari.
2. Click the Safari menu in the top left corner.
3. Select "Preferences".
4. Click the "Security" tab.
5. Make sure that the "Allow Plug-ins" box is checked.
6. Click "Plug-in settings..."
7. Check the box next to Adobe Flash Player in the left menu.
8. Switch "When visiting other websites" at the bottom of the window to "Allow".
9. Click "Done".
10. Close the Security window.
11. Click the Safari menu and choose "Quit Safari".

You can then open Safari again and you should be able to play the audio with no further trouble.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I'll be happy to help.

name: Turn off integrated diagnostic
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
We encourage all users to use the integrated diagnostic experience, as it is the best way to ensure that IXL can provide you with up-to-date diagnostic data so you can better personalize learning for your students. However, if you'd like, you can pause the diagnostic breaks for one hour, one day, or turn them off completely.

To do so, please follow these steps:

1. Go to http://www.ixl.com/signin and sign in to your account.
2. Click the arrow next to your name in the top-right corner to open your account menu, then select Profile & settings.
3. Scroll to the bottom of the window that appears.
4. Next to "Diagnostic breaks", select the option you prefer.
5. Click Submit.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I will be happy to help!

name: Turning off Integrated Diagnostic
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
In order to better support the many ways that teachers use IXL with students, the diagnostic breaks can be paused for 1 hour, paused for 1 day, or turned off completely. You can follow these steps to change the settings in your account for the Diagnostic breaks:

1) Go to http://www.ixl.com/signin and sign in to your account.
2) Click the arrow next to your name in the top-right corner to open your account menu, then select Profile & settings.
3) In the Profiles and settings window, scroll down to the Settings section and select the desired settings for Diagnostic breaks.
4) Click Submit.

The setting change for the Diagnostic breaks will apply to everyone on your account.
closing: If you have any questions, please let me know. I will be happy to help.
versions:
In order to better support the many ways that parents use IXL with their children, the diagnostic breaks can be paused for 1 hour, paused for 1 day, or turned off completely. You can follow these steps to change the settings in your account for the Diagnostic breaks:

1) Go to http://www.ixl.com/signin and sign in to your account.
2) Click the arrow next to your name in the top-right corner to open your account menu, then select *Profile & settings*.
3) In the Profiles and settings window, scroll down to the Settings section and select the desired settings for Diagnostic breaks.
4) Click *Submit*.

The setting change for the Diagnostic breaks will apply to all of your children.

name: Scores low, assigned activities
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
I was able to log in to your account and I see that all of the available activities have been assigned for BOOKTITLE. Since assigned activities are included in the cumulative total, your students scores are appearing low. For example, currently the eStudent activities manual has a total point value of VALUE. I can see one student has earned STUDENTVALUE/VALUE points which is an overall percentage of PERCENT%.

To increase the students' percentages of total work completed, you will need to un-assign any activities the students will not need to complete.To do so, please follow these steps:

1. Go to http://hlc.quia.com and log in.
2. Click on the title of your course.
3. Click on the "Books" tab.
4. Click the "Assign" option beneath the "Books" tab.
5. Use the menus to navigate to the appropriate chapter and section.
6. Click on the "A" icon associated with each exercise to unassign it.

Unassigned exercises will have a red circle and slash through the "A" icon and they will no longer be calculated towards students' total scores.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to help!

name: Training opportunities
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
While we don't have webinars or training sessions, we do have several video tutorials that can help. You can find the tutorials here:

https://www.quia.com/tutorials.html
closing: Also, if you do have any questions, I'm happy to answer them in detail and explain any features you're curious about.

name: Regrade/rescore quiz w/ mistake
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
While I recommend fixing the question so it doesn't impact future students' grades, doing so won't cause Quia to automatically rescore the quiz. Instead, I recommend giving every student full credit for the question with the mistake.

To award students credit for the question, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to http://www.quia.com/web and log in.
2. Click Quizzes in the left menu.
3. Next to the desired quiz, click Grade.
4. Under the "Question Summary" section, click the pencil icon to the left of the question with the mistake.
5. For any of the students who missed the question, change the value in the "Points" column to award them full credit.
6. Click Submit.

Students' grades will then be adjusted to reflect that they got credit for the question with the mistake.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I will be happy to help!

name: Integrated Diagnostic Info
body:
Our integrated diagnostic is a feature that allows students to take a short break from their skill practice to answer just a few questions from the diagnostic arena. Please see below for more information regarding these breaks:

Students will now see a new animation and text on the screen when the diagnostic break appears, which will help them better understand the purpose of the break. They will also receive breaks less frequently, every 15-20 questions. And if needed, students can skip the break by clicking a button at the top right of the screen.

And, in order to better support the many ways that teachers and parents use IXL with their learners, we are now giving them more control over the integrated diagnostic experience. In the Profile and settings, the diagnostic breaks can be paused for 1 hour, paused for 1 day, or turned off completely.

We do, however, encourage all users to use the integrated diagnostic experience, as it is the best way to ensure that IXL can provide you with up-to-date diagnostic data so you can better personalize learning for your students!

Each student will then be able to log in and get started with a Daily Coin Quiz!
closing: Please let me know if you have any other questions. I am happy to help!

name: SmartScore Outdated
body: Students receive the error message “Your SmartScore is outdated.” when they are signed in on two devices, two browsers, or two students are practicing in the same account. As long as your students make sure they are only signed in on one device, they won’t see the error again.
closing: If  you have any questions, please let me know. I will be happy to help.

name: Blank E-mail
body: We received a blank reply from this e-mail address.
closing: Please let me know if you would like assistance with anything. I'll be happy to help!

name: Quote Request Missing Numbers
body: I'm happy to provide pricing information. Our license pricing is based on the number of students and subjects included. To help me generate a quote for the correct amount, would you please confirm the total number of students you would like the license to cover? Also, which subjects would you like them to have access to?
closing: Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you!

name: All Subjects/Grades Selected
body: I would be happy to send you more information! Currently our math and language arts content are the only subjects that are available for all of the grades you have listed. Can you please confirm the subjects your students will need and their grade levels?
closing: Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you!

name: Gathering More Info
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to IXL!
body:
I am happy to provide pricing information. To help me generate a quote, would you please confirm the following information:

School Name
School District
School Address
Grade Levels
Number of Teachers
Number of Students Wanted
Subjects Wanted
closing: I look forward to hearing from you!

name: 5 Subjects Selected
body: I'm happy to provide pricing information. Our license pricing is based on the number of students and subjects. Would you please confirm which subjects you would like to include? Sometimes our system automatically fills in five subjects if the field is left blank, and I want to ensure that I am quoting you for the appropriate amount.
closing: Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you!

name: No Prorated/Monthly
body: Unfortunately, we don’t offer prorated memberships at this time. Our licenses run for a full 12 months, and payment is on a yearly basis. You are welcome to remove students and add new students at any time during the membership. When this school year ends, you can delete the students no longer in your class and add new students instead.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Requests Under 25
body:
I know that you plan to have fewer than 25 students using IXL. A 25-student license is the smallest license we currently offer. If there are other students in your school who would benefit from using IXL, you’re welcome to add them to your roster to use the extra spaces. Although you’ll be the only teacher with an account, you can always print/download reports from Analytics to share with your colleagues.

Additionally, you can remove students and add new students at any time during the membership. When the current school year ends, you can delete the students no longer in your class and add new students instead. You also have the option to divide your roster up into classes containing specific students. Our user guide is an excellent reference as you manage your roster https://www.ixl.com/userguides/IXLQuickStart_Roster.pdf .﻿

name: Trial Overview/Instructions
body:
You can create a free trial account using the following link: https://www.ixl.com/membership/school/trial . You will receive a confirmation e-mail to set up the account. Please be sure to check your spam folder, as it is sometimes sorted there automatically.

My favorite part of the free trial is that you are able to explore the “Analytics” and “Inspiration” sections of the site in more detail as you learn how to integrate IXL into your classroom. If you do choose to purchase an IXL license after your 30 days are up, you can convert your trial account into a paid account so that your student progress data will not be lost.
closing: Let me know what questions you may have as you explore IXL! I am happy to help.

name: Suggesting Free Trial
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body: For anyone new to our site, I always suggest checking out our free 30-day classroom trial as the perfect way for you to explore IXL with your students. You are welcome to create a trial account using the following link: https://www.ixl.com/membership/school/trial .
closing: Let me know if you have questions while you explore IXL. I will be happy to help!

name: Not Purchasing After Trial
body:
I'm sorry that you've decided not to extend your use of IXL. You will not be charged once the 30-day trial has ended, so feel free to continue to use it until it expires on XXXDATEXXX.

Students can still access up to 10 free questions per day as guests.
closing: If you need anything else, I'm happy to help.

name: Unsubscribe
body: I have removed you from our lists, so you shouldn’t receive any more messages from us.
closing: Please let me know if you need anything further. I am happy to help!

name: Re-starting Trial -We've missed you
body:
I am happy to reactivate your trial account for an additional 30 days. Your trial will end on XXXDATEXXX.

Your username is: XXXUSERNAMEXXX

If you need assistance with your password, please click on the following link to our Help Center: https://www.ixl.com/help-center/Your-account/What-do-I-do-if-I-forget-my-password-/1268772
closing: Please let me know if I can provide any further assistance. I am happy to help!

name: Modifying # of Students on Trial
body: I have increased your trial roster limit to XXXNUMBERXXX students. The additional spaces are available immediately. You may need to sign out of IXL and sign back in to access them.
closing: Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with!

name: Adding Subjects to Trial
body: I have added XXXSUBJECTXXX to your free trial. The change is effective immediately. You and your students may need to sign out of IXL and sign back in to refresh the system.
closing: Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with!

name: Inappropriate Username in Games
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us!
body:
We monitor the multiplayer game usernames very closely. These usernames are created by the players for the name they want to appear in the game while playing.

We have two different systems to block inappropriate usernames. WebPruify is a web based system that checks every user input against a giant database of inappropriate words. We also have a system that checks usernames if the internet is having issues.

I have notified our engineers of the report, and they are working to see why it may have made it through the filters.
closing: Please let me know if you have any other questions. I am happy to help.

name: Appreciating Feedback
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us!
body: I've shared your feedback with our development team and we may consider it in future updates. Please continue to share your thoughts with us. We keep track of feedback like this and are always looking for ways to improve. It helps us understand the needs of our customers and results in new teacher-friendly features!
closing: Please let me know if I can assist you further.

name: Not Available for Re-sell
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body: Please keep in mind that IXL is the sole distributor of our product, so it is not available for re-sale. As an educator, you are welcome to use IXL to enhance your teaching and give students the opportunity to practice, but you may not sell it to them. Our terms of service are available on the following link: https://www.ixl.com/termsofservice .
closing: Please let me know if you have additional questions.

name: Need more info, re-sell?
body: I'm happy to assist you. In order to ensure that I am suggesting a license and resources that are appropriate for your needs, I would love to learn more about your school. Would you please let me know a little more about your school and goals in implementing IXL?
version0Field: I'm happy to assist you. In order to ensure that I am suggesting a license and resources that are appropriate for your needs, I would love to learn more about your organization. Would you please let me know a little more about your organization and goals in implementing IXL?

closing: I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Extending Trial
body: I've processed the extension to your current trial period. Your trial is set to expire on XXXDATEXXX. The change is effective immediately. You and your students may need to refresh the page to see the change.
closing: Please let me know if you would like any further assistance. I'll be happy to help!

name: Daily Practice Limit
body: For students who do not have an account with us, we offer 10 free practice questions in each subject every day. Students who are part of active accounts often receive this message if they are not signed in with the correct information. Please be sure that they have signed in with their unique usernames and passwords from the teacher roster prior to practicing. When a student has signed in successfully, they will see "Welcome, STUDENT NAME" at the top right.
closing: I hope this helps. Please let me know if you would like any further assistance.

name: 10 Free Questions
body:
To access our 10 free questions per day, please follow the steps below:

1. Go to www.ixl.com .
2. Make sure that you are signed out of IXL.
3. Click "Learning" in the green bar along the top of the page.
4. Click the subject you would like to practice (e.g., Math).
5. Click the grade level along the left.
6. Click on the name of a skill you would like to practice.
7. Enjoy!
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Clarifying Teacher Numbers
body: I see that you have listed XXXNUMBERXXX teachers in your quote request. Do these teachers work with the same group of students? Is the total number of students XXXNUMBERXXX or is it XXXNUMBERXXX students per teacher? With this additional information, I can be sure that I’m suggesting an IXL license which is most appropriate for your needs.
closing: Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you!

name: 2-Teacher Accounts Explained
body: Our IXL classroom licenses can accommodate no more than two teachers. If you have two teachers with separate and distinct classrooms/rosters, a two-teacher license could be appropriate. When two teachers share a classroom license, they divide the total number of purchased licenses between them. Each teacher will have an individual set of login credentials and separate rosters. This type of license does not allow for the sharing of students between rosters.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: How to Activate Account
body:
The first step is to create and activate an IXL account.
o Go to www.ixl.com/membership/school/activate
o Enter your activation key XXXXXXXX.
o Fill out the form and click Create account.
o Your account will now be active.

2. Next, you will need to set up your student roster.
o Sign in to your IXL instructor account at www.ixl.com
o Click on the drop down arrow by your name in the right corner
o Choose roster
o Enter information for your first student, then click "Save."
o IXL will create a username and password for your student. This account is now active.
o A new row will appear. Continue entering information for each student.
o Make sure that each student signs in every time they practice so that you can track their progress!

3. If you already have an IXL account
o Sign in to IXL at www.ixl.com
o Click the link to enter an activation key near the top of your page.
o OR, navigate to the Account Management page and click the link to enter an activation key. Enter XXXXXXXXin the field that appears and click Submit.
o Your account will now be active.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: IXL Brochure Request
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body: To take a step toward sustainability and reduce waste, we have switched to using digital brochures. You are welcome to share digital or printed copies with your colleagues and administrators from the following page: http://www.ixl.com/static/math/brochure/us/IXL-brochure.pdf .
closing: If you have any questions, or if there is anything else I can help with, please let me know.

name: Video Tutorials
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body:
We have some great introductory videos in our Inspiration section: https://www.ixl.com/inspiration/videos . For a more in-depth look, we have archived webinars to help you explore and implement IXL in your classroom: https://www.ixl.com/inspiration/archived-webinars .

We also offer a special event, IXL Live, in 55+ cities across the US! This event is designed to help teachers become experts at using IXL. For more information, check out the following website: https://www.ixl.com/live
closing: We hope to see you at a session soon!

name: Quia Tutorial
body: If you are a beginner or an expert with Quia Web, please explore our Tutorial Center which features more than 25 step-by-step instructional videos on how to use Quia Web! You can access our Tutorial Center at https://www.quia.com/tutorials.html
closing: I am also happy to help with any questions you have!

name: What is Quia Web
body: Quia Web is a web-based product which allows instructors to create their own online content, including activities, quizzes, surveys and class web pages. Instructors can create multiple class rosters with an unlimited number of students, and assign their activities and quizzes to their students. Quia Web assists the instructor by grading most of the activities and quizzes, and provides the instructor with a detailed report on each student’s performance.
closing: Let me know if you have any other questions and I will be happy to help!

name: Quia Trial
body: We offer a free, 30-day trial of Quia Web. This gives instructors 30 days of full access to explore! To sign up, visit http://www.quia.com/newtrial.html .
closing: If you have any questions along the way, I’ll be happy to help!

name: Quia Brochure
body:
Quia Web is a web-based product which allows instructors to create their own online content, including activities, quizzes, surveys and class web pages. Instructors can create multiple class rosters with an unlimited number of students, and assign their activities and quizzes to their students. Quia Web assists the instructor by grading most of the activities and quizzes, and provides the instructor with a detailed report on each student’s performance.

To take a step toward sustainability and reduce waste, we have switched to using digital brochures. You are welcome to share digital or printed copies with your colleagues and administrators from the following page: https://www.quia.com/company/quia-web-brochure.pdf

If you would like to learn more, we offer a free 30-day Quia Web trial. This will give instructors 30 days to familiarize themselves with the features that Quia Web offers. To sign up for a free trial, visit http://www.quia.com/newtrial.html .
closing: If you have any questions along the way, I’ll be happy to help!

name: Bulk vs. Site
greeting: Thank you for the additional information.
body: We have two options for IXL subscriptions. The first are our classroom licenses, most appropriate for 1 teacher and 25-90 students. A second option is a site license which includes an administrator account, unlimited teacher accounts, and student accounts in increments of 25. Each license is priced based on number of students and number of subjects.
closing: Please let me know which option best meets your needs, and I will be happy to help you with the next steps.
versions:
We have two options for IXL subscriptions that might fit your situation. Both licenses are priced based on the number of students and number of subjects included. The first is our classroom license, which includes one teacher login and can hold 25-90 students. These start at 25 students and are priced in increments of 10 students after 30. A second option is a site license which includes an administrator login and unlimited teacher logins. There is no maximum capacity for these accounts and they are priced in increments of 25 students.

  • If your teachers are willing to share one login, I would suggest a classroom license. Our classroom license prices are available at the following website: https://www.ixl.com/membership/school/subscribe You can change the number of students and subjects to see different classroom license prices. Please keep in mind that these can hold a maximum of 90 students.
  • If your teachers need individual logins, I would suggest a site license. These are priced in increments of 25 students. A XXXSUBJECTXXX site license for XXXNUMBERXXX students would be XXXPRICEXXX per year.

For both options, students will have unlimited access to all of our grade levels at home and at school for a full calendar year. The teacher(s) and students can use IXL Analytics to monitor usage, progress, and trouble spots in real time.

name: Unclear Request
body: I am having a little difficulty understanding your request. To help me provide the most appropriate information, would you please explain a little more about what you need?
closing: Thank you in advance for your assistance.

name: Job Applicants
greeting: Thank you for your e-mail, and for your interest in working with IXL!
body:
You can view our current job openings by clicking on the following link: https://www.ixl.com/company/jobs

If you see a job that looks like a good match for your skills and qualifications, please apply directly through our website. This can be done by clicking on the job title, then ""Apply Now"" on the job description page. Resumes and cover letters can be uploaded to the application.
closing: We look forward to hearing from you!

name: IXL Super Strategies (Analytics)
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body: I highly recommend that teachers new to IXL check out the IXL Super Strategies playlist on YouTube. It shows different ways that student data can be used to monitor student progress, how to group students based on their trouble spots, and other fantastic features! Each video is about 1.5-2 minutes long, so you can watch all of them in about the amount of time that it takes to drink a cup of coffee. You can find the playlist by clicking on the following link: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLa8fn4yxivynwOhvOXyJIe80-n7NFHnPL
closing: Let me know if you have any other questions, and I will be happy to help!

name: Funding
body: We know that funding can be a concern for our teachers and schools. IXL has created a tool to help our customers explore private, state, and federal funding sources that teachers have successfully used to bring IXL to their classroom. You can view our funding guide by clicking on the following link: http://www.ixl.com/funding . I also hope you’ll explore our IXL blog for more ideas regarding outside funding sources: http://blog.ixl.com/2016/11/15/wondering-where-to-start-with-private-funding-for-your-class/﻿ .
closing: Please let me know if I can provide any further assistance.

name: 30-Day Fundraising
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body: Many of our schools have had success with our 30-day fundraising challenge. Students collect pledges for the number of problems they answer correctly. After students practice using our free trial, their friends and family donate based on their student's performance! For more information about this challenge, and a downloadable handout, please visit the following page: https://blog.ixl.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/30-Day-Fundraising-Challenge.pdf﻿
closing: Let me know if you have any other questions and I will be happy to help!

name: IXL Scavenger Hunt
body:
Have you had a chance to check out the IXL Scavenger Hunt? https://www.ixl.com/inspiration/IXL-scavenger-hunt.pdf This fun printable resource leads students on an exploration of IXL.com, introducing them to their Recommendations wall, the Continuous Diagnostic, and more!

Teachers can download and print the PDF straight from the Inspiration tab and have their students follow the clues to familiarize themselves with IXL. We hope you'll take advantage of this resource and share it with your colleagues.
closing: Let me know if you have any questions while exploring. I will be happy to help!

name: Supporting Special Ed Classes
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body:
IXL is a self-paced program designed to meet the needs of a variety of learning styles. Many teachers that work with students who have special learning requirements use IXL because it is flexible and allows students to access all grade levels while practicing at their own pace. Students have the option to go back and review previously-studied material or move ahead to try new skills at any time.

Additionally, IXL provides the option to hide both the grade level and timer if the students are sensitive to these components. You can use the Topics menu as a guide to finding skills to practice rather than searching only by grade level.

To find out how real teachers are using IXL as a supplemental program in their RTI/MTSS and special education classes, visit our blog by clicking on the following link: https://blog.ixl.com/2016/01/21/how-to-implement-ixl-with-an-rtimtss-model/
closing: Let me know if you have any other questions and I will be happy to help!

name: Unique Username and PW
body:
IXL is designed to track progress over time and adapt to each student’s unique ability level. To take full advantage of these features, the students should be listed on the roster. This will generate a unique username and password for each student. With this, they can sign in at school and at home for a personalized learning experience. Please keep in mind, if a student leaves mid-year, you can delete the student from the roster, refresh the page, and add a new student in the space.

If you’re interested in using IXL with a larger group of students, please let me know. We do offer site licenses with tiered pricing and we’d be happy to put together an updated quote for you!
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Classroom Buffer
body: Classroom licenses receive a one-time complimentary 5 student buffer. You'll first need to fill your classroom roster to its paid capacity. Afterward, you'll notice a link at the bottom of your roster page asking if you'd like to this free one-time buffer.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Hiding Grade Levels
body:
We have a feature that allows you to hide grade levels. This is especially useful if you have students working above or below grade level. If you’d rather they focus on their individual abilities instead of their current grade level, you can hide the grade levels. Sign in to your teacher account, click on the welcome drop-down menu in the upper-right corner, and select “Profile & Settings.” Under “Settings”. Then check the box for “Hide Grade Levels” and click Submit.

When the box is checked, all students on your roster will see grades levels represented as Level A, Level B, etc. In order to make sure students don’t accidentally see the original grade labels, instruct them to sign in at www.ixl.com/signin . You may find it helpful to bookmark this link for your students.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Star Feature
body:
You can suggest skills to all students on your roster by highlighting them from the practice pages. To do so, please follow the steps below:

Go to http://www.ixl.com/signin and sign in.
Click on Learning at the top of the page and then select a subject (e.g. Math or Science).
Click to select the appropriate grade from the tabs on the left. This opens the list of all skills available in that grade.
Move your mouse to the left of the graph icon of a skill you wish to assign. An outline of a star will become visible.
Click the star to color it gold and highlight that skill for students to practice.

When your students sign in to ixl.com and view their skills, they will see stars next to the skills you have selected.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Removing Students From Roster
body: You are welcome to remove students and add new students at any time during the membership. When this school year ends, you can delete the students no longer in your class and add new students instead. You also have the option to divide your roster up into classes containing specific students. Our user guide is an excellent reference as you manage your roster https://www.ixl.com/userguides/IXLQuickStart_Roster.pdf﻿
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Dividing Roster Into Classes
body:
To create classes, do the following when you are logged in to your account:

Click on the arrow next to your name at the top right.
Click "Roster"
In the top right corner of the teacher roster, click on “Start using classes.”
Enter your desired class name.
Click “Submit.”

A second column in your roster labeled “Class” will be added. Click in this column to choose the appropriate class for each student.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Diagnosing 1 Subj At A Time
body: We encourage students to use Continuous Diagnostic with questions from both subjects. However, if a student is asked to diagnose for a specific subject, they can do so from the Diagnostic arena. Once in the Diagnostic arena, the student can click the double arrow in the upper right corner then click an icon to select integrated, math, or ELA.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Diagnostic Score Explained
body:
When students begin answering questions in the IXL Continuous Diagnostic, the teacher can see a score range for each student under the Diagnostic section in Analytics. As students answer more questions, this range narrows. It usually takes between 100-120 questions to narrow a student's range in both math and language arts. Please keep in mind that students can work on narrowing their ranges over the course of a week or two, rather than all at once.

The IXL Diagnostic score provides an approximate grade level for each strand assessed. For example, a score of 500 suggests readiness for a student to work on fifth-grade skills. Students and teachers can view individualized recommendations for each student on the Recommendations wall and under the Diagnostic section in Analytics. Students can practice in their recommended grade level and complete diagnostic questions periodically to ensure that this information is up-to-date.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: No Diagnostic for Sci, SS, Spanish
body:
Although we do not offer a standalone diagnostic in Science, your students’ proficiency and performance are constantly assessed by IXL’s Analytics. The embedded assessment provides a real-time reflection of your students’ fluency with each skill.

Students can practice any of our grade-level material depending on their needs. We recommend that your students begin practicing in their grade level or on a current class topic. (You can sort IXL skills by topic by selecting a subject & then choosing “Topics” from the black menu bar.) As students answer questions correctly, they move to higher levels of rigor. If they answer a question incorrectly, they can continue to practice at the lower of rigor, improving their confidence with the subject matter.

name: Worksheets
body:
IXL is a fully Web-based learning program for Math, English Language Arts, Science, Social Studies, and Spanish, with apps available for iPads and Android tablets. IXL adapts to each student's ability in real-time, so we do not have worksheets available. Instead we encourage the use of IXL to track every student’s practice so that you can freely monitor their progress with IXL Analytics.

We do provide printable resources for classroom use that can enhance your students’ experience, including progress charts and customizable certificates. You can access these materials by clicking on the following link: https://www.ixl.com/inspiration/printable-resources.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Recommendations
body:
IXL’s Recommendation feature makes it easy for teachers to reach every student at their individual ability level. When students are practicing on IXL, they will see in-skill Recommendations--either foundational skills for review or enrichment skills for a challenge. This way, students always have skills that give them the immediate support they need, and they are empowered to make choices about when they receive remediation.

Additionally, IXL offers personalized Recommendations to every student based on their previous performance, which encourages students to be self-directed learners as they engage with IXL. The result is a truly differentiated, personalized classroom, won the following link every student is not only working at the right level, but also playing a role in driving their own learning.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: SmartScore
body:
Progress is measured using the SmartScore which increases or decreases as students practice. The SmartScore is a unique scoring system designed to give teachers the best possible information on students’ true understanding of a skill. Unlike a percentage score, SmartScore takes into account several factors, including questions answered correctly and incorrectly, question difficulty, recent answers, and consistency.

You can think of 0-70 as practicing or learning a skill, 71-90 as refining a skill with questions of mid- and high-level rigor, and 91-100 as working through challenging questions to cement mastery.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!
versions:
Once students reach a SmartScore of 90 and enter the Challenge Zone, they will need to answer a certain number of questions (as many as 10) correct in a row to reach mastery. The Challenge Zone includes the most rigorous questions for that skill, and requires students to prove they have truly mastered the skill by answering those questions consistently. If a student misses a question in the Challenge Zone, their SmartScore will recalibrate to a more accurate level, which usually involves a decrease of 3-8 points. This ensures students have the chance to refine their skills and build back up to mastery.

SmartScore mastery is defined as reaching 100, but scores in the 90-100 range indicate an ability to teach the topic. Requiring a SmartScore of 100 on every skill may not be realistic for all classrooms. By the time a student reaches a SmartScore of 90, they have achieved “excellence” by showing they are consistently capable of working through high-rigor questions. We often recommend 90 as a good goal to set for students.

I’ve attached an introduction to the SmartScore that you are welcome to share with your students and their parents.

[GO TO DRIVE AND ATTACH SMARTSCORE GUIDE]

name: IXL Open Architecture
body:
Our IXL content is built in an open architecture framework. That means that any student can work exactly where they need to at any given point. With that said, we don't have a way to prevent or "block" students from practicing specific skills. Rather, we suggest that teachers consider strategies which clearly communicate individualized IXL practice goals so that each student has a firm understanding of won the following link and what they should be practicing.

We have a great video on YouTube about our Suggested Skills tool. This tool can be used to highlight skills that you want students to practice while also emphasizing a growth mindset culture in your classroom. To access the video, click on the following link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d7ogCucjf2E

It is also possible to click on the name of a skill and copy the link at the top of the page. These links can be posted in your learning management system or e-mailed to your students to help them focus on particular areas.
closing: I hope this helps! Please let me know if you have any questions.

Teachers have the ability to direct students to specific skills needed to master their state standards: https://www.ixl.com/standards/ . In addition, we offer the revolutionary IXL Continuous Diagnostic and analytics suite to support teachers with up-to-date information on students' levels, trouble spots, progress made, and skills mastered.

versions: Our Science content provides skills in levels 2-8. Our content is aligned to NGSS and individual state standards: https://www.ixl.com/standards/ . The rigorous content for Physical, Earth, and Life Science builds background knowledge and vocabulary, developing reading comprehension and reasoning skills.

Our Social Studies content provides skills in grades 2-8. Our content is aligned to individual state standards, as well as CCSS: https://www.ixl.com/standards/ . IXL Social Studies supports students as they learn to understand expository texts, read and analyze graphic displays of information, and think critically about subject matter.

name: Diagnostic going down
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
While the practice that each student is completing will have an impact on their overall level, the greatest change in a students overall level will occur when they answer a diagnostic question incorrectly. You will also see a decrease in their levels when they select "I don't know this yet".

I was able to review the diagnostic data for each student and I noticed that they have recently answered some diagnostic questions incorrectly. For example, one of the 3rd grade Math questions answered by Gerardo was marked as incorrect.

Whenever students answer diagnostic questions incorrectly that are below their overall level, IXL will identify the related skill as a knowledge gap and decreases their overall score.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to help!

name: Student/Data Privacy
greeting: Thank you for your interest in IXL!
body: IXL Learning is a signatory of the Student Privacy Pledge ("SPP"), (https://studentprivacypledge.org/privacy-pledge/), an industry standard approach to privacy for K-12 service providers. The SPP was created by the Future of Privacy Forum (FPF) and The Software & Information Industry Association (SIIA) and has been endorsed by the National School Boards Association (NSBA), the National Parent-Teacher Association (PTA), and the White House. Our privacy policy (https://www.ixl.com/privacypolicy) is a statement of IXL's privacy policies consistent with the principles laid out in the SPP.

name: ADA Compliance
body:
IXL Learning is committed to providing products that are accessible to all of our customers and students, and that are compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act and sections 504 and 508 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973. IXL substantially complies with the requirements of Section 508 as set forth in 36 CFR Parts 1193 and 1194 (effective March 20, 2017) and the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines. Exceptions to the WCAG Level AA standard are: certain text equivalents, certain pages may require style sheets, certain questions may include tooltips and drag-and-drop elements, and skipping of navigation links.

IXL is actively working to meet applicable WCAG guidelines. We are dedicated to providing a learning experience that is enjoyable and accessible to all learners, and continuously design and test new features and improvements with this goal in mind.
closing: If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact IXL Technical Support at help@ixl.com.

name: Can't get e-mails
greeting: Thank you for contacting Quia. I'm sorry to hear that you haven't been receiving our automatic e-mails.
body:
We have checked and our server is sending out the messages, but if you're not receiving them, it means they are being mistakenly marked as "spam" or "junk mail". Here are some things you can do to begin receiving our automatic messages (like reset passwords).

1) Add these to your address book: quia@quia.com and help@quia.com

2) See if your e-mail program or filter has an option or setting that allows you to move e-mails classified as spam to a folder rather than being auto-deleted.

3) Contact your e-mail service provider to report that your e-mails are being filtered. Your e-mail provider is trying to protect you from unwanted e-mails, but when they begin blocking content you signed up for, it can become frustrating.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions.

name: Just PO Number Intl
body:
We are able to apply a purchase order to a quote if we have a copy of the PO document. Once it has been applied, an invoice is automatically generated and the account becomes active.

Some schools outside the US use only a PO number (without a document). Please let me know if your school does not generate PO documents, and we can invoice you directly. The account will become active once payment has been received.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Formal International Site Quote
body:
Our site licenses support two or more teachers and are priced in increments of 25 students. These site licenses also include access to one administrator account and unlimited teachers can always be added at no extra cost. Additionally, students will have unlimited access to all of our grade levels at home and at school for a full calendar year. Teachers can share students across their rosters allowing multiple teachers to view any student's performance at any time. Both the teachers and students can use IXL Analytics to monitor usage, progress, and trouble spots in real time.

I have attached a formal quote for you to review. This quote includes a real-time, online Professional Development Session led by former teachers and administrators, just like you on a mission to help all K-12 teachers deepen their instructional toolbox and help students lift achievement in literacy and numeracy.

These site licenses are only available for purchase directly through our representatives, so if you wish to subscribe, please let me know and we can discuss your next steps to order.
closing: I look forward to hearing from you.

closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Upgrade Explanation
body: You are welcome to add students or subjects throughout the duration of your subscription. You'll simply need to contact us to purchase an upgrade. Please note that our pricing is in increments of 10 students (after 30), so if you were to add 8 students we would need to add 10.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: No Upgrade Quote For Future Date
body: Our upgrade quote start date is automatically set as the day the quote is generated. This means that we are not able to set a future start date on an upgrade quote. If you'd like your upgrade to start at a later date, please contact us closer to that timeframe and we'll be happy to generate a quote for you then!
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I'll be happy to help!

name: Continuous Diagnostic
body: Our continuous diagnostic tool, available for IXL Math and Language Arts, learns about your class in two ways: students answer diagnostic questions (just a handful each week is enough!), and we also incorporate students’ regular IXL practice data. This approach gives you a true, whole-picture view of your students’ abilities that’s always up-to-date. Once your students get started, our algorithm quickly pinpoints what students know and provides a personalized action plan with skills to accelerate each student’s learning. You can learn more at www.ixl.com/diagnostic . We also have some great videos about it at https://www.ixl.com/inspiration/videos .
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions as you explore this feature. I'll be happy to help!

name: IXL Renewal w/ Quote
body:
I’ve attached a renewal quote to this e-mail for your review.

To move forward, you can e-mail a school purchase order to orders@ixl.com. Please include your account number on the order form. If you would prefer to pay directly with a credit card, please let me know and I will send you a link to our secure payment portal.

Please keep in mind that your renewal will take effect on XXXDATEXXX.
closing: If you have any questions along the way, I'll be happy to help!

name: Online Renewal
body:
You can renew your classroom license online. To do so, please click on the following link: https://www.ixl.com/membership/school/renew . If you are not already signed in to your IXL account, you will be prompted to login with your username and password in order to complete the renewal.

Once you've completed your renewal, you'll receive a confirmation e-mail. If you have any questions, we have some useful resources and FAQs in our Help Center: https://www.ixl.com/help-center/ .
closing: Please let me know if I can provide any further assistance.

name: Why Not Renewing?
body: I'm so sorry to hear your school will not be renewing its IXL subscription. Is there a particular reason? We value our partnership with your school very much, and would love to keep your students practicing on IXL. We are always looking for ways to improve our program and would appreciate any feedback you have for us.

name: Grades for Subjects
body: IXL currently offers math and language arts in grades Pre-K through 12, science and social studies in grades 2-8, and Level 1 of Spanish.

name: Request for Discount
body: We work with a variety of non-profits, low-income schools, and individual teachers. As such, our pricing is a standard rate.

I apologize for the confusion. It appears there was a technical issue when you registered for IXL, and I have reported this to our engineers so they can investigate. Can you tell me about the process you to used to register? Also, if you saw any error messages they will help me report the issue to our developers.

In the meantime, I will be happy to help you get started on IXL. You will first need to cancel your Apple iTunes purchase so you are not charged for an account you cannot access.

To cancel your App Store membership, you can reference these cancellation instructions from Apple.

Once you have canceled this account, I will set you up with a membership through IXL.com with a complimentary month of access.
closing:
Please let me know the following information so I can create the account:
  • Subjects you want to purchase (ex: math, language arts, science, social studies)
  • Number of children
  • Country edition (ex: US, UK, Canada, etc.)
  • Desired username
  • Billing address
I look forward to hearing from you!

greeting: Thank you for reaching out about the diagnostic breaks.

We’re glad to hear [you found it valuable / you and your students were able to try it out / your students enjoyed it]. We are excited to offer a diagnostic that is designed to work seamlessly with IXL’s curriculum, and we continue exploring different ways to combine them.

At this time, we are no longer testing ways to offer diagnostic questions during skill practice. body:
It sounds like your lab may not have enough bandwidth for all of your students to take the exam at the same time. We recommend that for each student that is taking the test, your connection has 50kbps of bandwidth. If you have 25 students, you would want to have 1.25mbps of bandwidth. Keep in mind that if there are multiple classes at your school taking it at the same time, the amount of bandwidth that your school will grow proportionately. You can go to www.speakeasy.net/speedtest to test your download bandwidth. Choose "San Francisco, CA" as the location you want to test your speed for to get an accurate idea of your speeds.

You may also contact us via phone at 877-282-4400, x3 for technical support.
closing: Let us know if you have any questions and we will be happy to assist you.

name: Parent can't see progress
greeting: Thanks for reaching out to us.
body:
I see from your device's detected information that you are signed in to the parent profile. While signed in to the parent profile, you are unable to see your child's progress. If you sign in to their profile, you will see the SmartScores and ribbons for all of the skills they have practiced. You can sign in to their profile by tapping your name in the upper-left corner of the screen and tapping on their name to switch to their profile.

In the future, you can view your child's progress at any time in your "Usage details" report by following these steps:

1) Go to https://www.ixl.com/signin on your tablet's browser and sign in.
2) Tap Analytics.
3) Select a subject, skill grades, and date range from the drop-down menus near the top.

You can then scroll down to see the details of your child's practice, including when they last practiced, the number of questions answered, time spent, and the specific skills practiced.

name: Activate Flash Firefox
body:
Please take the following steps to ensure that the Adobe Flash plug-in is activated within your Firefox browser:

1. Open the Firefox browser.
2. Click the menu button in the top right corner of the screen (looks like 3 parallel lines)
3. Click Add-ons in the menu that appears.
4. If not already highlighted in blue, click Plug-ins on the left of the page.
5. On the right of the page, find the "Shockwave Flash" plug-in.
6. Click the drop-down menu in the Shockwave Flash plug-in row and select "Always activate."
7. Close the browser to save the changes.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to assist!

body:
If you are having trouble hearing the audio in your book, then the Flash installed on your browser is not streaming the audio properly. To fix this problem, please try using a new browser.

Mozilla Firefox is a fast, secure browser that you can download for free here:

http://www.firefox.com

Click on the button to download Firefox and follow the prompts to install it to your computer. Once you have Firefox installed, you should have no further browser problems with the audio in your book.

name: product design call
body:
Hi Jennifer,

I hope all is going well! To prepare for some upcoming projects, our product management team is looking into conducting user interviews with administrators! We were wondering if you would be interested in speaking to our product designers about your role as an administrator.

You don't need to be super active IXL users or enthusiasts; we don't want to talk specifically about IXL right now, but instead want to learn more about your everyday responsibilities, goals, challenges, and how they work with edtech products in general.

Would you be willing to have a 30-minute phone call with one of the design team?
closing: Please let me know what you think and let me know if I can assist you with anything at this time!

name: Hide/Unhide Preferred
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
It sounds like another teacher is monitoring your student's progress, and that teacher has hidden the grade levels from his or her own account. This is why they are showing up as letters when your student signs in instead of the usual grade levels.

When the grade levels are hidden pre-K becomes "Level A", kindergarten becomes "Level B", etc. For your convenience, I am including the directions on how to hide/unhide grade levels, in case you need to refer to them. However, as long as your student is on the roster of a teacher who has hidden grade levels, you will not be able to unhide them.

To hide/unhide grade levels, please follow these steps:

1) Go to http://www.ixl.com/signin/CUSTOM and sign in.
2) In the upper right-hand corner of the page, click the arrow next to your name to open the account menu.
3) From the account menu drop-down, select Profile & settings.
4) In the Profiles and settings window, scroll down to the Settings section and select the Hide grade levels check box. The setting change will apply to everyone on your account.
5) Click Submit.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to help!

name: Zoom affecting Score Grid
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body: It sounds like your browser's zoom settings may be set to either above or below 100%. The "Score Grid" report is only fully supported at the 100% zoom level, and using a zoom below or above 100% can cause the student names in the grid to not align properly. I recommend setting your browser's zoom to 100% so you can view the report without issue.
closing: If you need help changing your zoom setting in your browser, please let me know which browser you are using and I will be happy to help.

name: What is IXL?
body:
IXL is an integrated personalized learning platform that is proven to improve learning outcomes for all students. IXL’s Continuous Diagnostic, comprehensive K-12 curriculum and guidance, and actionable real-time Analytics work together seamlessly to give teachers everything they need to differentiate instruction and help students grow.

You can view our IXL info sheet by clicking on the following link: https://www.ixl.com/membership/Product-Info-Sheet.pdf. This is a great summary of IXL that you can share with others.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to help.

body:

In order to cancel the mobile subscription, you first need to complete the membership.
  • Open the IXL app on the device you subscribed from.
  • The next screen will guide you through choosing a new username for the mobile subscription, different from your current username.
Then, to cancel the membership, you can reference these cancellation instructions from Apple.

Any refund requests must be submitted directly to iTunes. To contact Apple support regarding a refund for your subscription, you can use their Report a Problem form.

For further assistance with the mobile subscription, you can contact Apple Support at (800) APL-CARE (800-275-2273).

name: Accents for Spanish
body:
Spanish questions that require the use of an accented letter include a menu option you can use to select the letter required. To access this menu, click in the response box and then click on the arrow that appears in the bottom-left corner of the box. You will then be able to choose the accented character required for your answer.

Alternatively, you can type an accented character by holding down the [Ctrl] key and press the associated character. For example: [Ctrl] + [a] = á

name: Session expired (advanced)
greeting: Thank you for reaching out to us.
body:
It sounds like the quiz session is timing out. When this happens, the network connection to Quia is cut and the link to our servers is lost in the background. When the student tries to submit, they will get an error that the connection has timed out.

Session connections are set by an individual networked environment and the actual connection time is unique to that environment. Many wireless environment have a shorter session "time-out" than a wired Ethernet connection. This is by design for security reasons since wireless provides greater access to many more devices. School and public access wireless connections can be as short as 20 minutes or less before the device's session is terminated. In contrast, Quia's connection session has a duration of 12 hours. This means that a device can stay connected if it's on an Ethernet network for 12 hours without losing is networked connection.

To help resolve the issue, a good first step is to contact your school's IT department and see what the "time-out" session is for the access points in your environment. If you have students taking the quiz on their own outside of the classroom, its important to remind them that connecting to a public access point will limit their session time to about 20 minutes, which is typical when connecting to a free hot-spot.
closing: Please let me know if you have any questions. I will be happy to help.
